short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely guides you through making advanced changes inside the services you rely on without having to be a cybersecurity expert.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Havoc shield is a security operations platform that guides small business teams through implementing a professional-grade cyber security program across their workforce, wherever they may be,  and tightly integrates the services, policies, and infrastructure you need, all under one roof.

We make it possible for non-security types to protect their company from the reputational and financial loss associated with an attack, avoid regulatory fines, and speed through customer security requirements.

The Havoc Shield Guidance Assistant walks users through making advanced changes inside the services you rely on without having to be a cybersecurity expert. It can be used by both business account administrators, IT staff, and end users from any browser so long as they have a valid Havoc Shield account.
